Uses of Interface
com.sun.messaging.jms.Connection

Packages that use Connection
Package
Description
com.sun.messaging.jms.notification
Provides a notification API for the MQ client runtime to inform an application about a MQ connection state changes.

  • Uses of Connection in com.sun.messaging.jms.notification
